name: 2048 Cats & Dogs ( Kitty & Puppy Fight)
description:
Like playing 2048? Now you can try this one.

2048 Cats & Dogs is coming!

It's a brand new sliding block game. The cats is so cute that you can hardly tear yourself away from it.

* Elegant artworks and lovely characters !
* Many Super hero come to rescue !
* Larger game board, move more freely !
* Combo and combo never stop !

Meow ~, come and help the cats!
